typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as short,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as double,
		COMM as double,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> empSrc
empSrc split(DEPTNO==10,
	DEPTNO==20,
	DEPTNO==30,
	DEPTNO==40,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitDepatwise@(dept10, dept20, dept30, dept40, deptOthers)
ConditionalSplitDepatwise@dept10 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['dept10.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplitDepatwise@dept20 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['dept20.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplitDepatwise@dept30 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['dept30.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
ConditionalSplitDepatwise@dept40 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['dept40.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink4
ConditionalSplitDepatwise@deptOthers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['deptothers.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink5

source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as integer,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(DEPTNO),
	SumSal = sum(SAL),
		MinSal = min(SAL),
		MaxSal = max(SAL)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['aggegateData.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as short,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Deptno as short,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 exists(source1@DEPTNO == source2@Deptno,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as short,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> adlsEmpSrc
source(output(
		Deptno as short,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> adlsDeptSrc
adlsEmpSrc, adlsDeptSrc lookup(adlsEmpSrc@DEPTNO == adlsDeptSrc@Deptno,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as integer,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 pivot(groupBy(DEPTNO),
	pivotBy(JOB),
	SAL_Of_ = sum(SAL),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as integer,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsrccsv
empsrccsv rank(desc(SAL, true),
	output(sal_rank as long)) ~> Ranking
Ranking rank(desc(SAL, true),
	output(sal_dense_rank as long),
	dense: true) ~> DenseRank
DenseRank sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rankDense

source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as short,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 keyGenerate(output(SURKEY as long),
	startAt: 1001L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['sgtfile.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> targetSurgKey

source(output(
		order_number as string,
		customer as string,
		apple as string,
		banana as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> UNPIVOTSRC
UNPIVOTSRC unpivot(output(
		qty as integer,
		apple as string
	),
	ungroupBy(order_number,
		customer),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['unpivot.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as short,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> conditionSplit
conditionSplit split(DEPTNO=='10',
	DEPTNO=='20',
	DEPTNO=='30',
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(D10, D20, D30, OTHERS)
ConditionalSplit1@D10 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Dept10ConditionalSplit.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> d10target
ConditionalSplit1@D20 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Dept20ConditionalSplit.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> d20target
ConditionalSplit1@D30 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Dept30ConditionalSplit.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@OTHERS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['otherDeptConditionalSplit.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> otherDepartmentTarget

parameters{
	parameter1 as string (SAL+COMM),
	parameter2 as string (SAL+COMM)
}
source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> adlssrcemp
adlssrcemp select(mapColumn(
		EmployeeNumber = EMPNO,
		JustName = ENAME,
		Occupation = JOB,
		Salary = SAL,
		Commission = COMM,
		DepartmentNumber = DEPTNO
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumns
SelectedColumns derive(total = toInteger(Salary) + iifNull(toInteger(Commission),0)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(DepartmentNumber==10) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sort(desc(toInteger(Salary), true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> blobtargetemp

source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as short,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADLSEMPSRC
source(output(
		Deptno as short,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADLSDEPTSRC
ADLSEMPSRC, ADLSDEPTSRC join(ADLSEMPSRC@DEPTNO > ADLSDEPTSRC@Deptno,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		quiz as (sport as (q1 as (question as string, options as string[], answer as string)), maths as (q1 as (question as string, options as string[], answer as string), q2 as (question as string, options as string[], answer as string)))
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> jsonfile
jsonfile foldDown(unroll(quiz.sport.q1.options),
	mapColumn(
		question = quiz.sport.q1.question,
		options = quiz.sport.q1.options,
		answer = quiz.sport.q1.answer,
		maths = quiz.maths
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 foldDown(unroll(maths.q1.options),
	mapColumn(
		question = maths.q1.question,
		options = maths.q1.options,
		answer = maths.q1.answer,
		q2 = maths.q2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
Flatten2 foldDown(unroll(q2.options),
	mapColumn(
		question = q2.question,
		options = q2.options,
		answer = q2.answer
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten3
Flatten3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['examJson.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> JSON

source(output(
		name as string,
		no as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 window(over(name),
	asc(no, true),
	RANK = rank(),
		DENSERANK = denseRank(),
		LEAD = lead(no),
		LAG = lag(no),
		CUN_INDIVIDUAL = sum(no)) ~> Window1
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
